programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: The clinic is slammed with summertime cases as the vets battle to save a badly injured cat, a farm dog with a puncture wound, and a wobbling mini horse struggling to walk. programme.title: Secrets Of The Octopus
programme.desc: Octopus are like aliens on earth but they have one superpower that we are only now beginning to fully appreciate. programme.title: Secrets Of The Octopus
programme.desc: Octopuses break all the rules on animal intelligence. Born into the world as orphans, they are self-taught masterminds; capable of solving complex problems, strategizing, even planning for the future. Extraordinary superpowers that are the secret to their success.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Octopus
programme.desc: Octopuses were always thought to be natures ultimate loners, preferring their own company. The truth is they have secret social lives. programme.title: Sharks Up Close With Bertie Gregory
